full_summary:
===============

**Government Tender Announcement**

*   **Tender Title (English/French)**: E-Review Health Product and Food Branch - IM Architect, Business System Analyst, Quality Assurance Specialist and Platform Analyst / Révision électronique Direction générale des produits de santé et des aliments - Architecte en gestion de l'informations, Analyste des systèmes d'entreprise, Spécialiste de l'assurance de la qualité et Analyste de plateforme
*   **Reference Number (English/French)**: cb-6325-20333243 / numero de référence : cb-6325-20333243
*   **Solicitation Number (English/French)**: 1000251531 / numero de sollicitation : 1000251531

**Tender Details**
------------------

*   **Tender Status (English/French)**: Expired / Expiré
*   **Publication Date (English/French)**: June 9, 2023 / juin 9, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date (English/French)**: June 26, 2023, 2:00:00 PM / juin 26, 2023, 14 heures 
*   **Expected Contract Start Date (English/French)**: July 10, 2023 / juillet 10, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date (English/French)**: July 9, 2024 / juillet 9, 2024

**Tender Description**
--------------------

The Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) aims to modernize services used by the public and optimize business efficiency by investing in business system analysis, information management, platform analysis, and quality assurance. The services will be used to evaluate company systems, current processes, and compile objectives for improving company procedures. The contractor must submit a bid for all resource categories. 

Selected service providers must provide up to two (2) Level 2 Platform Analysts, three (3) Level 2 Information Management Architects, three (3) Level 2 Business System Analysts, and up to three (3) Level 2 Quality Assurance Specialist/Analysts to offer services across the HPFB on an as-and-when-required basis.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Please contact Matthew Gazo at **matthew.gazo@hc-sc.gc.ca** or 613-297-6479 for more information.
